caption.p: Cumulative incidence of coronavirus infection in children after allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation at Seattle Children’s Hospital by age (N = 404). Numbers below x-axis show the number of patients at risk by age (0–5 years vs 6–17 years). Of note, OC43 and HKU1 were detected in bronchoalveolar lavage specimens from 2 infants, respectively.
